title: Change git commit for remote (already pushed)

body.raw:
In order to change an already pushed commit, we can amend the last commit and then force push it, to override the remote.

```bash
git commit --amend -m "New commit message"
git push --force
```

title: Drop all tables in a PostgreSQL schema

body.raw:
Sometimes it is required to just drop all tables of a specific schema in PostgreSQL.
In order to delete the whole schema, execute the below command in the SQL query console.

```sql
DROP SCHEMA public CASCADE;
CREATE SCHEMA public;
```
This helps to delete tables, that are for instance not deleted during an auto creation of the schema using Hibernate.

title: Remove a file from tracking in Git

body.raw:
Replace `<file>` with the file you want to remove from tracking
```shell
git reset HEAD <file>
```
